headline: Copart, Inc. to Release Second Quarter Fiscal 2026 Results
summary: DALLAS, February 12, 2026--Copart, Inc. (NASDAQ: CPRT) announced today that it will release earnings for the second quarter of fiscal 2026 after 4:00 p.m. Eastern Time (3:00 p.m. Central) on Thursday, February 19, 2026.

content.title: Copart, Inc. to Release Second Quarter Fiscal 2026 Results
content.summary: DALLAS, February 12, 2026--Copart, Inc. (NASDAQ: CPRT) announced today that it will release earnings for the second quarter of fiscal 2026 after 4:00 p.m. Eastern Time (3:00 p.m. Central) on Thursday, February 19, 2026.

headline: Copart Credit Facility Expands Growth Options While Shares Trade Below Targets
summary: Copart has secured a new $1.25b unsecured revolving credit facility. The facility is intended to support growth initiatives such as acquisitions, capital investments, and global expansion. This senior credit line adds financial flexibility for Copart as it plans its next phase of growth. For investors watching Copart, ticker NasdaqGS:CPRT, this financing move comes with the stock trading at $39.51. Over the past year, the share price shows a 33.1% decline, although the 5-year return sits at...
